title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki

lucaa - (11:08): hi guys  
lucaa - (11:09): anyone in the mood to bounce some ideas about implementing the dashboard macro? namely about how to implement editing the dashboard (ordering of the items, adding items deleting items)

mflorea - (18:02): cjdelisle, sdumitriu: I'm in a UI test and I want to check if the page is in WYSIWYG edit mode. One simple way is to look at the HTML page title: in WYSIWYG mode it is "Editing wysiwyg Test Page". This is not clean though. Any other options? I'd rather not check if the WYSWIYG editor is present. I'm interested in a simple and clean check.  
sdumitriu - (18:04): No idea  
mflorea - (18:04): (I don't want to check if the WYSIWYG editor loads fine, but just to know if I'm in WYSIWYG edit mode.)  
lpereira left at 18:05 (Quit: Leaving.  
mflorea - (18:06): question: are the UI tests written for the latest skin?  
lucaa joined #xwiki at 18:08  
mflorea - (18:09): if so, then I could check if the WYSIWYG edit menu item is selected
